item.title: ?This Simple Trick Will Help You Instantly Spell 'Best Friend' Every Time!
item.description: Introduction Do you ever have trouble spelling the phrase “best friend”? It can be tricky to remember all the letters, and even trickier to remember the correct order. But don’t worry - we have a simple trick that can help you spell “best friend” correctly every time. What is a Best Friend? A best friend is someone you trust and confide in, someone who you can rely on, and someone who you can laugh and have fun with.
